name: iscrngo
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c0, ccm2)))
-| wceq(ccring, cin(crngo, ccm2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRingOps ↔(c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c0 ∈ Com2))
⊣ CRingOps =(RingOps ⋂ Com2)
